quotes.quote: The saddest summary of a life contains three descriptions: could have, might have, and should have.
The reason it hurts so much to separate is because our souls are connected.
Anger, tears and sadness are only for those who have given up.
Every man has his secret sorrows which the world knows not, and often times we call a man cold when he is only sad.
There is no greater sorrow than to recall happiness in times of misery.
Don't criticize something you know nothing about. It only brings people down and makes everyone miserable.
Pain and suffering are always inevitable for a large intelligence and a deep heart. The really great men must, I think, have great sadness on earth.
I'm not okay, I'm just good at pretending I am.
There can be no rainbow without a cloud and a storm.
Sadness does not come from bad circumstances. It comes from bad thoughts.
Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional.
When feeling sad, dream on! When feeling happy, dream on! You shall survive by means of your dreams!
When sorrows come, they come not single spies, but in battalions.
The best thing for being sad, is to learn something. That's the only thing that never fails. Learning is the only thing for you. Look what a lot of things there are to learn.
Every thought is a battle. Every breath is a war, and I don't think I'm winning anymore.
The only thing worse than being sad is for others to know you are sad.
Behind every beautiful thing, there's some kind of pain.
If life doesn't kill you, emptiness will.
Being sad with the right people is better than being happy with the wrong ones.
You have to hurt in order to know. Fall in order to grow. Lose in order to gain. Because most of life's lessons are learned through pain.
Some days are just bad days, that's all. You have to experience sadness to know happiness, and I remind myself that not every day is going to be a good day, that's just the way it is!
Don't be sad because it's over. Be happy because you can start over.
It can be really powerful to write something when youre sad.
You cannot protect yourself from sadness without protecting yourself from happiness.
It's sad when someone you know becomes someone you knew.
Sometimes you have to do things when sad things happen.
Never make someone a priority when all you are to them is an option.
Tears are words that need to be written.
Absolute silence leads to sadness. It is the image of death.
Sinks my sad soul with sorrow to the grave.
At times, I feel overwhelmed and my depression leads me into darkness.
Don't cry over someone who wouldn't cry over you.
It's easy to cry when you realize that everyone you love will reject you or die.
For all sad words of tongue and pen, the saddest are these, 'It might have been.
